description: Squares on infinite chessboard at n moves from center using a {2,3} fairy knight.
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,-1).
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(x + 1) (12 x^8 - 24 x^6 - 20 x^5 + 28 x^4 + 20 x^3 + 12 x^2 + 5*x + 1)/(x - 1)^2, {x, 0, 50}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 16 2013 *)
